title: TailorHer
description: TailorHer is a personalized tailoring assistant designed especially for women. Whether you're designing your next outfit, scheduling fittings, or browsing styles, TailorHer makes the process seamless and stylish. We connect customers with expert tailors, provide inspiration for fashion-forward looks, and simplify tailoring management through a clean, easy-to-use mobile interface.
missionText: To empower women with an intuitive, accessible, and empowering tailoring platform that blends traditional craftsmanship with modern convenience.
